is also tested and treated if 
necessary. You will need to 
avoid all sexual contact with 
your partner until you have 
both	finished	treatments.
If you or your partner have 
other sexual partners, or if 
you have other children, they 
may also need to be tested. 
Your sexual health team will 
advise	you	and	offer	help	in	
contacting partners.
Syphilis can pass from a 
mother to her baby during 
pregnancy. If left untreated 
it can result in babies being 
born with symp
